member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.AmazingApi.Controllers.DemonstrationController.GetSum(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The number on the left, which must be a positive integer
The number on the right, which must be a positive integer

member.name: T:MSA.Phase2.AmazingAPI.Controllers.WeatherForecastController
member.summary: This is the weather forecast controller that comes as a default from the project template when creating a new c# Web API application.

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.AmazingAPI.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get
member.summary: This endpoint takes no arguments, and gives you the weather forecast
member.returns: A JSON object describing the weather forecast

member.name: M:RedditController.GetRawRedditHotPosts
member.summary: Gets the raw JSON for the hot feed in reddit
member.returns: A JSON object representing the hot feed in reddit
